alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 11:21AM CDT until March 31 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Hazardous Fire Weather Conditions this afternoon into tonight... ...Red Flag Warning for Smoky Mountain counties extended through tonight... .The combination of high winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will create hazardous conditions for fires to spread this afternoon and tonight. ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT THURSDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE SMOKY MOUNTAINS OF EAST TENNESSEE... * TIMING...From this afternoon and through tonight. * WIND...Sustained winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph in most locations, with gusts up to 80 to 90 mph in the mountains and foothills. Winds decreasing late tonight. * HUMIDITY...Minimum values between 20% and 30% are expected. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or are expected to occur shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains
